basics.name: Richard Chiriboga
basics.label: Senior Manager, Web Development
basics.summary: Experienced Web developer based in New York City with more than 20 years experience managing multiple projects and priorities concurrently, currently in a global, multi-lingual environment. Specializing in website and app development using languages that include PHP, Mysql, Javascript, AngularJS, jQuery, HTML, CSS and more.  Additionally, demonstrated Hispanic marketing and social media expertise as evidenced through leadership of my award-winning website CorrienteLatina.com. A website dedicated to covering everything from music, movies to travel, food and much more.

work.summary: Manage IT team and all web properties. These include AvonBcc.org and Avon39.org
highlights: Built our Brand website - AvonBcc.org (Wordpress, Bootstrap, CSS3, jQuery)
Wrote our "Check-in Friday" system which allows staff and volunteers to manage our walkers, crew and donations during physical event weekends.
Manage Strategic planning and IT/Web Efforts for the brand.
Manage Brand IT relationship with Blackbaud which includes Liminate Online and Luminate CMS
Managed Brand IT relationship with Classy (DIY Program)

work.summary: Worked on several teams that managed both the corporate intranet as well as the corporate website
highlights: Helped build the corporate intranet on our own custom platform.
Helped manage and launch new functionality for the corporate website.
Became an Scrum Master and managed a team of 4 Developers on our Latin America initiative.

work.summary: Senior Web Developer Worked directly with the president and project manager in all aspects from concept to creation for client websites.
highlights: Developed and/or assisted in all major projects brought into the company.
Built and maintained a custom content management system for all clients.
Lead development paths for the business.

awards.title: 2017 Jack Daniel's Neighborhood Flavors Honoree
awards.summary: For my work in uplifting the latino community in Queens and around the US.

awards.title: 2016 Best Latino & Culture website
awards.summary: Won the award for Best Latino & Culture website with my CorrienteLatina.com website.
